scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.update:all: npm update && cd frontend && npm update && cd ../backend && npm update
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules package-lock.json frontend/package-lock.json backend/package-lock.json
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run lint" "echo 'Backend linting not configured'"
scripts.check-types: cd frontend && npm run check-types || echo 'No type check in backend'
